name: One Knight
description:
This is my entry for GTMK 2019.

The idea behind this game is an RPG where you can only upgrade one stat per boss. You can level it up as many times as you can afford but you can't touch another stat until the next boss has been defeated. I started this with only 8 hours to go so it's very unfinished. I hope you like the general concept. There is no real end goal.

Other ideas I had were that almost everything RPG'y would be limited to 1, one slot per inventory type, 1 weapon slot, etc but I didn't have time to experiment with any of that.

The only stats you can upgrade are Vitality and Energy.

Most assets are CC0 assets from OpenGameArt.org. Sources to come later.

All code geneated during the jam.

WASD - Move

Left Click - Attack

Q - See Stats

T - Reset if stuck
